Actions.Name: Calculate the emissions from electricity
Actions.Description: Calculate the carbon emissions and offset the impact from electricity.

Actions.Name: Calculate the emissions from flight
Actions.Description: Calculate the carbon emissions and offset the impact from a flight.

Actions.Name: Calculate the emissions from freight shipments
Actions.Description: Calculate the carbon emissions from freight shipments and offset the impact.

Actions.Name: Calculate emissions from merchant category code (MCC)
Actions.Description: Calculate the carbon emissions from merchant category code (MCC) and offset the impact.

Actions.Name: Calculate emissions from package shipping
Actions.Description: Calculate the carbon emissions from package shipping and offset the impact.

Actions.Name: Calculate the emissions from vehicle
Actions.Description: Calculate the carbon emissions and offset the impact from a vehicle.

Actions.Name: Convert estimate to purchase
Actions.Description: Converts a carbon offset estimate to a purchase

Actions.Name: Direct purchase by carbon amount
Actions.Description: Allows either the calculation or purchase of an offset to neutralize the impact.

Actions.Name: Direct purchase by transaction amount
Actions.Description: Allows either the calculation or purchase of an offset to neutralize the impact.

Actions.Name: View custom portfolio details
Actions.Description: Get information around a given portfolio ID. Includes a back reference to offset sources.

Actions.Name: View project details
Actions.Description: Get details about an offset source with the given project ID.

Actions.Name: List project types
Actions.Description: Returns a list of project types.
